name: Melon Game
description:
"Melon Game" is a short game where you play as a melon, exploring a world filled with dangerous sentient junk foods and pastries. Scattered throughout the world are unique upgrades that will help you along the way! Win the game by defeating the big burg just above the starting area, but defeating him won't be easy, so find as many upgrades as possible before taking him down!! 

This is my first fully independently created and released game, which was originally a small school project I decided to finish on my spare time! Please leave some feedback in the comments if you like it!! :))

There's no music in the game but I did atleast try to add some sound effects :/ Feel free to listen to something chill in the background!
